resources.string: This version of the app is incompatible with the server\'s version. Please update both devices to the latest version of the app.
An error occurred. Please try again. If the issue persists, try moving this device or the kitchen device closer to a wireless access point, or checking for an updated version of the app.
The device was unable to connect to the specified server. Please check that the join code is correct, and that both devices are on the same network.
